changelogversion.changelogtext: [b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Update UI to [font color=red]material design[/font] guidelines!!!
New animations and ripple effects
Quick chat notification now appears on other screens too.
Use friends name for searching suggestions
Better performance and memory usage
Improve connection stability
Add auto reconnection
Update to season 5
Bug fixes
Better support for large screen and landscape view coming soon.
Fix logging into NA server issue
Fix Live game stats issue
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Clicking on the message notification that pops up in app (not the notification bar) will take you to the chat with that friend.
fix a bug that caused frequent random crashes
Many other small improvements
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] You can now add and remove friends
Add more buttons to the friend card expand
Change the buttons style in the friend card expand
Fix crash for large screen device when viewing summoner profile
Other small Bug/crash fixes
Update/Fix view summoner profile
Add Azir image
Bug/crash fixes

[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] optional notification for when a friend becomes available.[br][br] i.e. when a friend: [br] - comes back from being away [br] - finishes a game [br] - exits a queue/match
Bug/crash fixes
Add master league
Optimize in app memory usage
App also uses less memory when in background
Some minor UI changes
Bug fixes
Add login as offline
Show icon when app is running and connected.(You can disable it in settings)
Minor bug and crash fixes
[b][font color=red]UI overhaul![/font][/b] Hope you like the new looks :)
Shows pre-made team in live game stats
Other small improvements
Show summoner spells in live game stats screen
Improve live game stats screen appearance
[b][font color=red]New[/font][/b] live game stats implementation. (Should load much [b][i]faster[/i][/b] now!)
Add player's elo to live game stats
optimize memory usage
Fix issues for people with different in game name and login name
Switch out the remember checkbox to one for username and another for password
App now starts in login screen if a region was previously selected
Enable screen rotation for app, however landscape view has limited support atm.
Crash fix
Clicking back button from the chat screen will now slide back to the friend list screen
Fix crash for devices on Ice Cream Sandwich when receiving a notification
Fix a bug where it sometimes crashes when coming back to the app after it being in the background for a while.
Change tabs name and show the team color in live game statistics.
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add feature to view live game statistics!
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add logout button to the navigation drawer
Optimize performance for screens with list view
Make the "i" button in your friend list larger on regular screens
Resize things in region selection and login screen for larger screens
Fix bugs where sometimes incoming messages don't show up
Fix Other small bugs and crashes
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add win rate pie graph to summoner's profile
Add fade in animation to friend list
Bug fixes
Selected navigation drawer item now changes to a different text color
Add change log
Small bug fixes
Initial release.
